name: Slime Island
description:
This game is for the Brackeys game jam. The theme was Stronger Together. I made this solo. Hope you enjoy! 

You are a rookie adventurer looking for adventure. You hear that there is an island taken over by evil slimes. Can you save the island? You can't do it alone though.

Assets I used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/quantum-ui-162077

https://old-flick.itch.io/flicks-pixels

https://heirey.itch.io/mud-knight

https://stealthix.itch.io/animated-slimes

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/top-down-2d-rpg-assets-pack-...

https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
